Headline: Temporary #3 King Drive Reroute near King Drive/71st
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses temp. rerouted near King Drive/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a street blockage near King Drive/71st.

Northbound buses will operate via King Drive, 71st, State, 69th, King Drive, and resume normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via King Drive, 69th, Lafayette, 71st, King Drive, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
